name: Mother Goose: Hidden Pictures
overview: Mother Goose: Hidden Pictures is an animated activity book for children. Linda Arnold sings twenty-six popular Mother Goose nursery rhymes. Each rhyme is accompanied with a hidden object puzzle. Players have to find a selection of hidden objects in the illustrated backgrounds. When all the objects are found the background begins to animate to reward the player. Included songs: Jack Be Nimble, Hickory Dickory Dock, Little Miss Muffet, Wee Willie Winkie, Old King Cole and others.
